name: The Chickening
description:
The Chickening is a surreal platformer about a chicken who shoots lasers.. out of its eyes.

Controls - Move: Arrow Keys. Shoot: Enter. Turbo Shoot: Shift. Jump: Ctrl or Space - Start Game: Enter

PC download Supports compatible GamePads (Generic, Xbox, ??). Default is first GamePad if a game is start when its plugged in, otherwise change options to pick different gamepads or keyboard in drop down menu under Player plug and play.
